attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Benny bears are becoming exinct we must act now!(due to global warming)
However one BennyBear is breeding like a whale and is keeping the species from becoming extinct! act now before it's to late! its a discrase

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
